SELECT MEMBER_CODE , MEMBER_ID , MEMBER_PW , NICKNAME , EMAIL , PHONE , GENDER , MARRIED_STATUS , MEMBER_ROLE , WEDD_VEF , SIGNUP_DATE FROM MEMBERS WHERE MEMBER_CODE = #{ codes }

SELECT A.POST_CODE , A.MEMBER_CODE , A.POST_TITLE , A.POST_CONTEXT , A.POST_DATE , A.MAIN_CATEGORY , A.SUB_CATEGORY , A.VEF_STATUS , A.REVIEW_STATUS , A.VIEW_COUNT , B.MEMBER_CODE , B.NICKNAME FROM POST A LEFT JOIN MEMBERS B ON (A.MEMBER_CODE = B.MEMBER_CODE) WHERE MAIN_CATEGORY = '자유' OR MAIN_CATEGORY = '리뷰' ORDER BY A.POST_DATE DESC

SELECT A.POST_CODE , A.MEMBER_CODE , A.POST_TITLE , A.POST_CONTEXT , A.POST_DATE , A.MAIN_CATEGORY , A.SUB_CATEGORY , A.VEF_STATUS , A.REVIEW_STATUS , A.VIEW_COUNT , B.MEMBER_CODE , B.NICKNAME FROM POST A LEFT JOIN MEMBERS B ON (A.MEMBER_CODE = B.MEMBER_CODE) WHERE A.POST_CODE = #{ id }
